wikipedia_page.main: Vice Admiral Sir Charles Percival Ross Montgomery  (born 12 April 1955) is a retired Royal Navy officer who served as Second Sea Lord from 2010 to 2012. He then served as Director General of the Border Force from 2013 to 2017.

link_mentions.page: Second Sea Lord and Deputy Chief of Naval Staff

response: Vice-Admiral Sir Charles Montgomery was named as the new Director General on 25 January 2013.
* Vice-Admiral Sir Charles Montgomery KBE, RN, (2013-2017)

In March 2014 Charles Montgomery, Director General of the UK’s Border Force, announced before the Home Affairs Select Committee, that the e-Borders programme would be terminated. The search for a new supplier has been underway since 2013.
*Sir Charles Montgomery (Royal Navy officer) (born 1955), British admiral
*Charles Montgomery Burns, or Mr Burns, a character in The Simpsons
*Charles Montgomery (American Horror Story), a fictional character
Smith retired from public service on 31 March 2013 after over 40 years with the Home Office. He was succeeded by Sir Charles Montgomery.
